definitions.definition: Any form of personal , retaliatory action against an individual , institution , or group for some alleged or perceived harm or injustice .
examples: When I left my wife, she tried to set fire to the house in revenge .
After tearing his fave T-shirt unintentionally, my brother wreaked revenge on me by ripping my most prized blazer apart.

definitions.definition: A win by a previous loser .

main_definition: Any form of personal , retaliatory action against an individual , institution , or group for some alleged or perceived harm or injustice .
secondary_definitions: A win by a previous loser .
